brief_summary: This project evaluates the effectiveness of different aspects of a program to assist type 2 diabetes patients with dietary changes. It evaluates the effectiveness of Personalized Self-Management Training and Community Resources support, using a randomized design. This study will also evaluate what percent of patients are willing to participate in such a program, and what percent of primary care physicians are willing to recommend it to their patients.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Type 2 diabetes - Diagnosed for at least one year - Patient of a primary care provider Exclusion Criteria: - No telephone - Not speaking English
